static void lnet_fill_ni_info ( struct lnet_ni *  ni,
struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *  config 
) [static]

Grabs the ni data from the ni structure and fills the out parameters.

Parameters:
[in] ni network interface structure
[out] cpt_count the number of cpts the ni is on
[out] nid Network Interface ID
[out] peer_timeout NI peer timeout
[out] peer_tx_crdits NI peer transmit credits
[out] peer_rtr_credits NI peer router credits
[out] max_tx_credits NI max transmit credit
[out] net_config Network configuration

void lnet_lib_exit ( void   ) 

Finalize LNet library.

Precondition:
lnet_lib_init() called with success.
All LNet users called LNetNIFini() for matching LNetNIInit() calls.

Definition at line 1490 of file api-ni.c.

References LASSERT, list_empty(), list_entry, lnet_t::ln_lnds, lnet_t::ln_refcount, lnet_destroy_locks(), lnet_unregister_lnd(), and list_head::next.

Referenced by lnet_exit().

int lnet_lib_init ( void   ) 

Initialize LNet library.

Automatically called at module loading time. Caller has to call lnet_lib_exit() after a call to lnet_lib_init(), if and only if the latter returned 0. It must be called exactly once.

Return values:
0 on success
-ve on failures.
